tag_list: mobile, payments, financial-services, commerce, m-commerce, e-commerce
overview:
Georg is an accomplished visionary mobile payment solutions product expert.

Over the past 10 years he developed and delivered mobile and online services across the globe, covering both CDMA and GSM networks.

2000: created and delivered T-Mobile Austria’s online contract upgrade solution with customer value dynamic offers and fulfilment logistics 2001: acquired T-Mobile Austria’s banking license in cooperation with Legal & Finance department; established standardised M-Commerce Interface Austria (MIA) in cooperation with all other Austrian mobile network operators 2002: created and delivered m-payment solution for T-Mobile Austria’s Prepaid customers 2003: launched T-Mobile Mobile Wallet across Europe 2004: completed T-Mobile UK’s t-zones shopping/ticketing/lottery offering 2006: adidas Footbal World Cup mobile marketing campaign in 8+ countries 2007: created and launched MasterCard’s Mobile Partner Program 2009: created, managed and delivered MasterCard’s Mobile MoneySend (US)

milestones.description: Joined LUUP as Vice President of Products
